item.title: Dev Workflow for Custom Resources
item.description: AWS CloudFormation allows users to declare what resources are required in a project. When using CloudFormation, a developer’s responsibility is to describe what he wants while letting the service figure out how to get there.
About Hello, my name is Jonathan Pelletier, and I am a remotely working Cloud Solutions Architect based in Montreal, Canada.
